snippet: In his eighth N.B.A. season, J. R. Smith is averaging 18.2 points, 4.8 rebounds and 3.2 assists, all higher than his career averages, in helping the Knicks to a 5-0 start.
abstract: New York Knicks guard JR Smith has embraced his new off-the-bench role and in turn has thrived for the undefeated Knicks, averaging 18.2 points a game; Smith is preparing with team to face San Antonio Spurs.
lead_paragraph: In his eighth N.B.A. season, J. R. Smith is averaging 18.2 points, 4.8 rebounds and 3.2 assists, all higher than his career averages, in helping the Knicks to a 5-0 start.

headline.seo: In Top Form, Knicks’ J. R. Smith Hits a Career Low in Ego
headline.main: In Top Form, Knicks’ Smith Hits Career Low in Ego
headline.print_headline: In Top Form, Knicks’ Smith Hits Career Low in Ego
